name: HomelandTD
description:
HomelandTD is tower defence game made in Unreal Engine.

There is tutoral level and one normal level. 

Get resources, build towers and units, survive and defeat  the big boy. For now there is only one (optional) event avaiable - the bandit camp. There will be more events in the future.

You can buy 4 units that can be upgraded.

Archer - light dmg; crit. chance

Balista - heavy dmg; slow chance

Cannon - heavy aoe dmg; stun chance

Mage - fire dmg; burn(dot) chance

Enemys have diffrent armor, dmg to base and speed.

Help me improve my game. If You find some bugs let me known: homelandtd@gmail.com

HF
